description: Try our easy to follow Australian Prawn & Sweet Corn Chowder with Cheddar Scones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Australian Prawn & Sweet Corn Chowder with Cheddar Scones
name: Australian Prawn & Sweet Corn Chowder with Cheddar Scones Recipe | Woolworths
